mapper.insert: insert into role_permission (id, permission, role_id, property_id, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{propertyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update role_permission set permission = #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, property_id = #{propertyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, permission, role_id, property_id, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time from role_permission where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, permission, role_id, property_id, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time from role_permission
